member.name: T:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector
member.summary: Class that needs to be inherited during implementing custom integration connector. Several members have to be implemented in order to achieve desired functionality.

member.name: P:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.LogIntegrationForExternalTasks
member.summary: Determines whether to log integration tasks when processing external tasks. False by default.

member.name: P:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.FetchedInternalTasks
member.summary: Fetches internal integration tasks for processing.

member.name: P:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.FetchedExternalTasks
member.summary: Fetches external integration tasks for processing.

member.name: P:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.SyncManager
member.summary: SyncManager instance.

member.name: P:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.ClearTranslationsAfterProcessing
member.summary: Says whether to clear cached translation information (true by default). Applies both to internal and external tasks. If switched to false, translations can still be cleared by calling ClearInternalTranslations() or ClearExternalTranslations().

member.name: M:CMS.SynchronizationEngine.BaseIntegrationConnector.ProcessExternalTask(System.Object,CMS.Synchronization.IntegrationProcessTypeEnum,CMS.DataEngine.TaskTypeEnum,CMS.Synchronization.TaskDataTypeEnum,System.String)
member.summary: Processes incoming task.
member.param: Object or document to process (either already prepared ICMSObject or raw external object)
What to do if the processing fails

member.summary: Processes incoming task.
member.param: What to do if the processing fails

member.summary: Suitable for implementing outcoming CMS object processing. Identifiers of object is already prepared to match external application.

member.summary: Suitable for implementing synchronous outcoming CMS object processing.

member.summary: Determines whether given CMS object and task type match the subscription. This method recognizes TreeNode and GeneralizedInfo as the CMS object.

member.summary: Determines whether given node and task type match the subscription

member.summary: Determines whether given task type matches the TaskType property
member.returns: TRUE if task type is equal to TaskType property

member.name: M:CMS.Synchronization.BaseIntegrationSubscription.IsMatch(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether given site name matches the SiteName property
